title: Dark Foreboding
description: A chill wind blows and all light sources dim for a moment.

title: Warp Echo
description: For a few moments all sounds are muted and distant.

title: Unholy Stench
description: The stink of putrefaction and corruption hangs in the air.

title: Hoarfrost
description: A layer of frost covers everything within 3d10 metres.

title: Mind Worm
description: The psyker hears muttering and whispers in his mind.

title: Spoilage
description: Any food or drink within 5d10 metres instantly rots.

title: Haunting Breeze
description: A ghostly wind chills the air, fluttering clothing and hair.

title: Veil of Darkness
description: For a brief moment, shadows deepen and light sources waver.

title: Distorted Reflections
description: Reflections in nearby surfaces distort grotesquely.

title: Breath Stealing
description: Everyone within 4d10 metres feels a sudden shortness of breath.

title: Bleeding Walls
description: Blood seeps from nearby walls and surfaces.

title: Daemonic Whispers
description: Voices from beyond the veil can be heard by everyone within earshot.

title: Warp Madness
description: All characters within 2d10 metres must make a WP test or gain 1d5 Insanity Points.

title: Terrifying Visions
description: Horrible visions of the Warp assault the mind of the psyker.

title: The Earth Protests
description: The ground trembles and shakes within 5d10 metres.
effect: Agility test or fall Prone within 5d10m.

title: Bloody Tears
description: The psyker weeps blood. Temporarily blinded for one round.

title: Psychic Feedback
description: The psyker's brain burns with warp energy.

title: Unnatural Aura
description: Animals panic and flee, servitors malfunction.

title: Memory Worm
description: The psyker must make a WP test or forget events of the last 1d5 rounds.
effect: WP test or lose 1d5 rounds of memory.

title: Perils of the Warp!
description: The warp tears through! Roll on the Perils of the Warp table.
effect: Roll on Perils of the Warp.
